creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Panel of k'ossu depicting the Taoist Immortal, Lu Tung Pin, with his emblems the sword across his back and a fly brush in his hand. Lu wears a blue and white checked robe and a blue cap. The ground is soft brick-red with green leaves, sun disks, and clouds in green, blue, tan, and brick red. K'ossu frayed at top and bottom. Former Classification: Textiles - Tapestry
title: Panel Fragment
